name: zendframework/zend-expressive
description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

suggest.filp/whoops: ^1.1 to use the Whoops error handler
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-helpers: ^1.0 for its UrlHelper, ServerUrlHelper, and BodyParseMiddleware
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-aurarouter: ^1.0 to use the Aura.Router routing adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-fastroute: ^1.0 to use the FastRoute routing adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-zendrouter: ^1.0 to use the zend-mvc routing adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-platesrend: ^1.0 to use the Plates template renderer
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-twigrender: ^1.0 to use the Twig template renderer
suggest.zendframework/zend-expressive-zendviewre: ^1.0 to use the zend-view PhpRenderer template renderer
suggest.aura/di: 3.0.*@beta to make use of Aura.Di dependency injection container
suggest.xtreamwayz/pimple-container-interop: ^1.0 to use Pimple for dependency injection
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: ^2.5 to use zend-servicemanager for dependency injection
